greeting.title:
Sakyawira 💍 Debbie
We are getting married!
greeting.message:
To our dear ones who have always warmed us with their love.
We invite you to share the precious moment of our first step as a married couple.

You'll find all the details about when and where below. And if you can't make it in person, no worries—there will be a livestream link so you can celebrate with us from anywhere!

mapInfo.address2: 40 Kingsley Street, Westmere, Auckland 1022, New Zealand

locationInfo.title: 📍 Place
